data.text:
@sophiemillarr Hi. To help us assist, please confirm via DM any of the outstanding details below: 

> Item tracking number
> Sender’s and Recipient’s name, address, and contact details
> Any relevant claim/complaint reference numbers  

^RM
@sophiemillarr @RoyalMail Moght be a doctor by look of it! 😅😂
@sophiemillarr @RoyalMail That’s a kids attempt at a signature 😂😂
@sophiemillarr Left in bin? If not they should check with who’s delivered it and see if they can remember where it was delivered to 👍
@sufcben The map pretty much says my house as to where it’s been delivered but it hasn’t
@sophiemillarr Should sign it xp1 ,fuck knows what they’ve signed it on yours but they should be able to check where it’s been signed if it’s been delivered to wrong house/street
